Repeat: (Knit 2 together but do not slip from needle.  Insert right-hand needle between the stitches just knitted together and knit the first stitch again.  Then slip both stitches from needle together) twice, p2

k1, knit 2 together but do not slip from needle. Insert right-hand needle between the stitches just knitted together and knit the first stitch again. Then slip both stitches from needle together. k1, p2
